label: average
comment: An average of observations made over the given time window.

label: count
comment: The total count over the given time window.

label: instant
comment: An instantaneous observation recorded at single point in time.

label: maximum
comment: The maximum value observed over the given time window.

label: minimum
comment: The minimum value observed over the given time window.

label: sum
comment: The sum of values observed over the given time window.
